reviews.review: Lovely game at a very good price. It's awesome, try it! :)

Firstly, I love this game because you can drive all over Europe. You have to manage your money, and make sure that, when you get out a loan from the bank, you have enough money to pay it back, or are at least making enough daily profit to pay it back.

You also manage a business. You can hire drivers to work for you, and they will complete jobs for you, but you have to pay them a wage, plus some for every journey they complete. You level up they skills, that make them be better at certian things, like you can make them earn more money for going over a set distance, or you can make them carry high value or fragile cargo. They can also carry ADR materials, so things that could be dangourous. But you get paid more for that.

You can always do 'Quick Jobs', and these are when the employer provides the truck, and you just go where they tell you. This is fun, but it starts to get boring, only doing short deliverys, so you can buy a truck, so that you can go further distances, and get more money.

To conclude, I feel that anybody who likes games like Farm Simulator, or any simulator game should give this game a try, because it is a great way to unwind after a long day, and I have found it to be so much fun and very calming. Some people say that this is a boring game, I happen to disagree.

Das ist ein voll geiles Spiel. Es ist viel besser als Call of Duty und meiner Meinung nach auch besser als Counter-Strike: Global Offensive. Setz' es dir am besten auf deine Wunschliste, um von Rabatten als erster zu erfahren. 

[spoiler]Es wird im Spiel erst entschieden, ob die Terroristen oder die Counter-Terroristen gewinnen, aber sach's keinem. [/spoiler]

CSS is a complete classic, if  you're looking for a good challenge. Get it, if you're not. Maaaaaybe save your money.

11/10

Ооо... Чёткая игра, начал во всей серии CS именно с неё. Ещё как-то узнал про CS 1.6, и по сравнению с ней в CSS графика - круче некуда. Комп у меня слабый - игра тянет без лагов. Ну просто супер! Рекомендую всем!!!

Counter-Strike: Source – онлайновая мультиплеерная игра. Основанная на крайне популярном моде к Half-Life, Counter-Strike, данная игра является полностью переработанной его версией на новом движке.Хоть эта игра старая, но в нее играет очень много людей. по моему мнению Cs 1.6 и Cs Source, намного круче Cs G0....
Tiene muchos servidores, es muy divertido, y no cambia.

Some servers are all about fun, some servers are really competitive.

The FPS. Every Steam gamer ought to have this one at some point. It's a classic LAN party game. The game is simple, complehensible and quick yet challenging. There's a newer CS:Go with prettier graphics and friendlier controls. But This CS:Source runs on almost all the computers since 1995-ish and much more mods are available which can not run on CS:Go. Some of them are crazy fun.
Tres bon jeu, de bon moment passer dessus
